frontmatter.title: Why Should We Pay Attention To Reproducibility In Analysis Pipelines?

posts.content: A practical guide to reproducible analysis pipeline.

frontmatter.title: Extract data from Google Datastore API with Python and Jupyter Notebook

posts.content: I had a project that required a lot of work with Google Datastore. However, there is surprisingly few instructional materials for this part. So I hope my article could make the job easier!

frontmatter.title: Spotify Analysis: How Music Taste Changes Between Then & Now

posts.content: This is a blog post for my first data analysis project: Spotify EDA, and also my first post featured on CodeX publication.
